ygData.subject: Re: Stats on reinforced or studded leather
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/21/99 4:32:00 PM Central Daylight Time, twest@fremontcomp.com writes:  This is very untrue unless
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/21/99 4:32:00 PM Central Daylight Time,
twest@... writes:

<< most kills yield up ruined pelts. >>

This is very untrue unless you are speaking of low level animals. If you want
medium quality cat pelts (for Studded) You kill Pumas in East Commons along
the desert wall. If you want high quality cat pelts (for Reinforced) You kill
Lions (especially Patriarch and Matriarch) in the Karanas. As far as I know
Patriarch and matriach are most commonly found in Eastern Karana along the
path. Also for low quality cat pelts are sometimes found on Pumas, as are
high quality.
